item.description:
Plot/Fear/Kill...See "Murder at the Howard Johnson's" produced by the Suffield Players. A wacky comedy about three inept murderers who are also a love triangle. Plots are hatched, plots fail, alliances are formed and broken. Who will survive?

Mapleton Hall, 1305 Mapleton Ave, Suffield, CT. A restored historic 1883 building, the home of The Suffield Players, a community theatrical group.

This seems to be such a popular play that many of the performances are sold out already!!! Thus the need to change the date and reserve tickets in advance!

Tickets are $15. I have reserved 12 seats already.

Arrive by 7:30 pm please. Meet me (Linda Karen) at the entrance. I will have your ticket.

I 91 N to Rte 190 W to Rte 159 N (East St) to Mapleton Ave (a left).

Shot/Beer/Bill...After the play, we'll go to The Shamrock Cafe, 1117 East Street South (Rte 159), Suffield. This is a full service bar with pool (billiards), pinball and other bar games, entertainment and food. A local joint. Open until 2 am.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: DATE CHANGED AGAIN! Plot/Shot, Fear/Beer, Kill/Bill Nite
